# filterList [![Build Status](https://api.travis-ci.org/travishorn/jquery-filterList.png)](https://travis-ci.org/travishorn/jquery-filterList) ## Description Uses an input box to filter an unordered list in real-time. ## Required HTML

## Required JavaScript $('#filter').filterList(); ## Links * [Online Demo](http://jsfiddle.net/x5KSQ/)
